post:
Hello!

We have put together an offer for the lovely folks on LEB & LET, and to make a change its not from ColoCrossing (shock horror).

All of our Florida SSD VPSs are running:

- 4x 512GB SSDs (100k IOPs)
- RAID 10 Storage with BBU.
- Intel E3-1230 or above CPU
- Free Instant Setup with love!
- Supermicro Servers
- 24x7 Support
- SolusVM
- rDNS Capability
- 1Gbps Port

====================================

**LEB SSD VPS Package**

- 512MB Ram
- 15GB SSD Disk Space (Hardware RAID 10 w/BBU)
- 1TB Bandwidth
- 1 IPv4 Address
- 16 IPv6 Addresses 
- Access to 1 Core (3.2Ghz)

Price: $7.00/mo

Order: http://mylovevps.com/hostbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=259

====================================

FAQ?

    Do you have an ISO list? _Yes we do (click here), anything not there just ask and we will add it for you._

    How can I pay? _We currently only accept PayPal at the present time._

    Are your servers instantly setup? _Yes they are._

    Do you have 24/7 support? _Yes we provide 24/7 support via out support ticket system._

    Do you have any test IPs & files? _Yes we do they are located here: http://www.lovevps.com/locations/#contentFlorida-tab._

====================================

Moving From a competitor? Send us an email and get 15% off your first invoice!

Any questions be sure to email me on matthew@lovevps.com or grab me on Skype: LoveVPS.

If you require a quote for any services please drop us an email and we will do our best to help.
